resources.string: We have sent a one-time password\nto your email address.
Your email address is successfully verified
Let\'s create your admin profile now.
Password is not in the requested format.
You need this username during sign in. Please record it somewhere safe.
Great, your account is almost ready
Let\'s now invite your colleagues, and clients here
Sorry about that, Please try again or report the issue
404 Error, That page is \nunknown or does not exist
Sorry about that, but the page you looking for is available
A link has been generated to reset the password
The selected user will be removed from the vault
